constituent: clear up, sun, day, blue, grow up, moon, flesh
heisigStory: Take the key word in its associations with the weather (unless that tempts you to include the primitive for weather, which doesn't belong here). Its elements: sun . . . blue.
koohiiStory1: Sun and blue sky! Yep, the weather´s cleared up!
koohiiStory2: When we speak of clearing up we easily think of both the sun and blue skies. But in another since to clear up is the absence of weather. And therefor the reason weather has no place in its writing.
kunYomi: は.れる、は.れ、は.れ-、-ば.れ、は.らす
readingExamples: 晴らす (は.らす), 晴れる (は.れる)
words: be sunny, clear away, stop raining
